name: Glitch Valley
description:
You are the keeper of a small piece of digital world threatened to be destroyed by glitches. 

It's up to you to fix the glitches with your trusty laptop!

arrow keys = moving around

Enter key or mousebutton left = AOE repair

Art and sound by NielsB

Code by Ferai and Borislav

Music from https://filmmusic.io:

by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
